topics.body:
I was looking at Argentinian women, and they had very long hair.
It was very striking.

Why don't women here do that?
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53431ff16368721deb370100#post_53431ff16368721deb370100

Because!!!
topics.author: 31bee2686368722a0df23600

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53431ff16368721deb370100#post_53431ff16368721deb370100

Hair length has two factors.

First is genetics.  Some folks are born capable of reaching Rapunzel territory and some barely hit shoulder length.

Second is maintenance.  Do you _really_ want to deal with all the extra work long hair entails?  More shampoo, more time brushing and styling, more care taken to keep it from snagging on things, you name it.
topics.author: 5057a9e47f123b142a012d03
